cast.name: 维克托·普罗斯库林 Viktor Proskurin

introduction: The picture will consist of three separate stories linked together in meaning. All events will unfold during the Civil War, and not just military action in frame is practically, they will like background. The focus of the lives of ordinary people with their seemingly everyday household cares, however, even in the rear of each passing day becomes a struggle for survival.The project was supported by the Ministry of Culture.
